				UDP Create
192.168.56.1 -- 192168561 -- c0a83801
1100000010101000
0011100000000001
192.168.56.2 -- 192168562 -- c0a83802
1100000010101000
0011100000000010

0017 (Decimal)
0000000000010001
000d (5(bytes) + 8(header length) = 13)
0000000000001101


4444 -- 115C
9999 -- 270F
5 + 8 = 13

3132333435

115C 270F 000d ____ 3132333435

1's Complement of (c0a8+3801+c0a8+3802+0011+000d+115c+270f+000d+3132+3334+3500) = 3cae


python udp_create.py 192.168.56.1 4444 192.168.56.2 9999 3132333435
115c270f000d3cae3132333435

python udp_create.py 192.168.56.1 4444 192.168.56.2 9999 74657374
115c270f000cee3c74657374

			
				UDP Parse

Condition for invalid segment
1) Length of segment less than 9 bytes(8byte of header length + atleast 1byte data) i.e.( 18 characters)

2) Checksum does not match




python udp_parse.py 115c270f000cee3c74657374 192.168.56.1 192.168.56.2
4444
9999
12
0xee3c
9f86d081884c7d659a2feaa0c55ad015a3bf4f1b2b0b822cd15d6c15b0f00a08


python udp_parse.py 115c270f000d3cae3132333435 192.168.56.1 192.168.56.2
4444
9999
13
0x3cae
5994471abb01112afcc18159f6cc74b4f511b99806da59b3caf5a9c173cacfc5
